entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 12:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -14.0°C
Wind: W 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 except minus 17 in low lying areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 13 except minus 17 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
